name: Ace of Blades
description:
A local multiplayer game about swords!

Up to 8 people can battle it out on the same screen in this game about sword-based combat. Hit the sacrificial victim "willing participant" more times that all your other opponents to win.

Swords will rain down from the sky as you fight - make sure you don't get hit on their way down. Also avoid swords thrown by opponents, as they'll kill you instantly. You'll need to tactically take out the other players without losing all your swords, then use your remaining ones to hit the sacrifice.

You can angle the swords you throw, as they move in the same direction you're moving. If you're skilled enough, you might get a flick shot off and surprise your opponent!
